title: Launcher won't work?
body:
I tried opening the lol launcher just now and it gave me this error message

Failed to launch RADS\system\rads_user_kernel.exe

If someone knows how to fix this that would be great cause I don't know how. 
Thanks in Advance! :)

replies.body:
RADS kernel errors are often the result of missing administrative rights that League requires in order to operate fully. Because League accesses a ton of files outside of the League directory, I recommend assigning it system permissions using [our guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

Let me know if this issue persists.
